plot: Popular family drama starring veteran movie star Maria Schell as journalist Maria Behringer living in a Munich suburb together with her husband Florian and their three daughters Katja, Alex and Tami.
plot_en: Popular family drama starring veteran movie star Maria Schell as journalist Maria Behringer living in a Munich suburb together with her husband Florian and their three daughters Katja, Alex and Tami.
plot_es: Popular family drama starring veteran movie star Maria Schell as journalist Maria Behringer living in a Munich suburb together with her husband Florian and their three daughters Katja, Alex and Tami.
title: Die glückliche Familie
